maqras.text: When the heaven is torn
And it admits its Lord, and is ready
And when the land is stretched
And it spits out what is in it and becomes empty
And it permits its Lord, and is ready
O man, you will be moving towards your Lord and meeting Him
Sowhoever is given his record in his right
Hewill then receive an easy reckoning
And he will return to his family in joy
Andas for he who is given his record behind his back
He will invoke his destruction
Andhe will enter a blazing Fire
He used to be joyful among his people
He thought he would not be returned
No,He is ever seeing of him
SoI do swear by the redness of dusk
Andthe night and what it is driven on
Andthe moon when it is full
Youwill ride a platform upon a platform
So what is the matter with them that they do not believe
Andwhen the Qur'an is read over them, they do not prostrate
No,those who have rejected are in denial
AndGod is more aware of what they gather
So inform them of a painful retribution
Except for those who believe and do good works, they will have a reward that will not end
By the heaven laden with towers
And the appointed Day
And a witness and a witnessed
Destroyed will be the people of the ditch
The fire they supplied with fuel
Which they then sat around
And they were witness to what they did to the believers
And they hated them simply because they had asked them to believe in God, the Noble, the Praiseworthy
The One to whom belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth, and God is witness over everything
Those who have persecuted the believing males and the believing females, and then did not repent, they will have the retribution of Hell, and they will have the retribution of the burning
Those who believe and do good works, they will have estates with rivers flowing beneath them. Such is the great reward
Thepunishment of your Lord is severe
It is He who initiates and then returns
AndHe is the Forgiver, the Most Kind
Possessor of the Throne, the Glorious
Doer of what He wills
Hasnarrative of the soldiers come to you
Pharaoh and Thamud
No,those who rejected are in denial
AndGod after them is encompassing
No,it is a glorious Qur'an
In a tablet, preserved
By the heaven and the herald
And do you know what the herald is
The piercing star
Every soul has a recorder over it
Solet man see from what he was created
Hewas created from a water that spurts forth
Itcomes out from between the spine and the testicles
For He is able to bring him back
The Day when all is revealed
Then he will not have any power or victor
Andthe sky which gives rain
Andthe land with cracks
This is the word that separates matters
Andit is not a thing for amusement
They are planning a plan
AndI am planning a plan
So respite the rejecters, respite them for a while
